column4: can you install the extensions into /usr/lib/firefox/extensions/ ?
some extensions are available in the repositories which do exactly that.  for example:

available packages are: firefox-dom-inspector, firefox-greasemonkey, firefox-themes-ubuntu, firefox-webdeveloper, mozilla-biofox, mozilla-bookmarksftp, mozilla-checky, mozilla-ctxextensions, mozilla-diggler, mozilla-imagezoom, mozilla-livehttpheaders, mozilla-mozgest, mozilla-nukeimage, mozilla-stumbleupon, mozilla-tabextensions, and mozilla-venkman
